wikipedia_page.main: Lee Bradley Brown (18 June 1971 – 12 April 2011) was a British tourist who died in custody in Dubai, United Arab Emirates, after he was arrested for verbally assaulting a Nepalese maid. The circumstances surrounding his death remain disputed.

response: **Lee Bradley Brown, tourist (died in police custody) (b. 1971)
* April 12 – British tourist Lee Bradley Brown dies in police custody of causes that are still not clear.
